title: CheckNetworkSettings (Method)
text:
METHOD PROTECTED CheckNetworkSettings : BOOL
Checks, if parent ETH device is configured properly.
Returns TRUE if the network settings are valid.
In case FALSE is returned the BACnetServer will not start.
In case there is nothing to check (BACnetIPdatalink underneath BACnetServer or PLC) simply return TRUE.
